# `lines` for [filters](/commands/categories/filters.md)

<div class='command-title'>Converts input to lines.</div>

## Signature

```> lines {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--skip-empty, -s`: skip empty lines


## Input/output types:

| input | output       |
| ----- | ------------ |
| any   | list\<string\> |

## Examples

Split multi-line string into lines
```nu
> $"two\nlines" | lines
╭───┬───────╮
│ 0 │ two   │
│ 1 │ lines │
╰───┴───────╯

```
